inn1.comm: nerves? An extremely wide ball outside off with lots of swing away from the right-hand batsman. Sehwag chases with a wild swing and gets beaten. That looked wide, but it hasn't been called
short of a length outside off with good carry through to Kamran after Sehwag lifts his bat out of the ay
driven through covers for four. The ball was a touch too full outside off, Sehwag says so still and brings his bat down swiftly to crash the ball through the in field
shorter length with less room outside off, Sehwag tries to force off the back foot through cover but gets beaten by the shape away from him
fuller length outside off stump, Sehwag leans into a square drive but hits it to the fielder at point. He opened the face of the bat
Sehwag pushes off the back foot towards cover
good length ball around off stump at gentle pace, Tendulkar leans forward and taps the ball towards midwicket
Razzaq takes the pace off the ball and keeps a tight line around off, Tendulkar mis-times his attempted push towards cover
steady wicket-to-wicket line from Razzaq, Tendulkar stays in his crease and blocks. Pakistan have started calmly here ...
Tendulkar pushes the ball towards mid-on and sprints like a younger man for his first run, Wahab Riaz misses at the bowler's end but Tendulkar was safe
Sehwag drives on the up and hits the ball past the fielder at short cover, he doesn't get past the fielder on the edge pf the circle though
pushed off the front foot towards cover
a half-volley on leg stump dismissed by Sehwag with a crisp flick off his pads. He hit that in the air but there was no fielder anywhere near midwicket
too straight again, not as full, but Sehwag stays in his crease and whips the ball off his pads through midwicket. Still no fielder there.
short of a length around the hips, Sehwag tucks the ball off his body towards the man at square leg
too straight again and Sehwag flicks, this time past the fielder at square leg and the ball races across his fast outfield towards the boundary before the fielder at long leg can get to it
that's the fourth of the over. A slower ball outside off stump. The length was short and there was width. Sehwag waited for it and cut the ball hard through point
the fifth! And it's a front-foot no-ball as well. Too full outside off and Sehwag drills the ball off the front foot through extra cover. Gul is rattled. Sehwag on the charge ...

Sehwag its on the back foot and tries to heave the short of a length ball over the leg side, he mis-hits in into his pad. This game has burst into life in this over. Pakistan need to control the damage.
Tendulkar threads the ball through a tiny gap at point and his timing is excellent. It takes ages for the fielders to reach it.
length ball around off stump, Sehwag drives on the up but doesn't get past cover
length ball which is pretty straight and Sehwag has hit it straight. He planted his front foot forward and hit the ball through the line over the bowler's head.
on leg stump this time and Sehwag flicks off his pads towards fine leg
length ball around off stump, Tendulkar punches off the front foot towards short cover
pure timing and placement. Tendulkar moves forward and drives with zen-like calm through extra cover. Mid-off should have dived to try and cut it off but he didn't
Sehwag waits in his crease and opens the face of the bat to play towards point
good length around off stump, Sehwag strides forward and punches towards cover. Ball coming on to the bat nicely. The bounce looks good.
Sehwag uses the width and length outside off to drive the ball powerfully off the back foot, the fielder at point is in the way
that's a rubbish half-volley on middle and leg I'm afraid. Sehwag whips it through midwicket with a fearful lash of his wrists
there's the first bouncer! And Sehwag ducks under it.
that's another bouncer, perhaps a touch slower? It was wider outside off though and Sehwag reached for it and lashed it over point ... Pakistan on a leather hunt
hits a good length from over the wicket and zips it across the right-hander, Tendulkar lets it go through to Kamran
Tendulkar moves a touch forward to cover for the angle across him and whips the ball towards square leg
pitches outside leg this time and allows Tendulkar to nudge the ball off his thigh towards fine leg
Wahab tests Sehwag with the short ball, Sehwag ducks again. The short ball got him out against Australia ...

Taufel has given Sehwag out and he's asked for a review against the lbw decision immediately. He didn't even check with Tendulkar. Brilliant decision from Taufel. That ball pitched just in line with leg stump, short of a length, and skidded on to Sehwag, beating the batsman's attempted flick off the back foot. That ball didn't bounce as much as Sehwag thought it would. He was on his toes playing the shot. The only doubt was whether it pitched in line, it did. Pakistan are ecstatic.
Gambhir gets going by nudging one that angles into him towards the leg side
Gul immediately pitches on a good length and zips the ball across the left-hander, beating Gambhir
played towards third man for a single
Gul's troubles aren't over yet. He strays down leg and Tendulkar glances the ball to the fine-leg boundary
good length and a better line on off and middle. Tendulkar defends on the off side from the crease
he was aiming for the yorker, but didn't get it quite right. Tendulkar drives the over-pitched delivery to mid-on
Tendulkar pushes the length ball through cover and calls for two initially, he'll get three

Tendulkar's bat is rather awesome. He just clipped a short of a length ball from outside off between the fielders at mid-on and midwicket. It didn't look like it had enough legs to reach the boundary but it grew plenty on the way there
played off the body towards square leg
Wahab beats Tendulkar with a 115kph slower ball. Tendulkar was through his pull and though he tried to adjust he couldn't prevent getting hit on the hip
played back to the bowler this time
too full with width outside off, Tendulkar moves towards the ball, crouches on one knee and plays the perfect square drive through point
short of a length closer to off stump, Tendulkar moves towards the off, gets behind the line and plays towards cover
Gambhir immediately indicates he wants to clear his front foot and hit but readjusts to defend
Ajmal bowls a quicker one outside off, Gambhir cuts but doesn't beat gully
cut off the back foot towards point
that is too close to cut, far too close to off stump, but Gambhir cuts. To the fielder at gully.
nudged off the pad towards midwicket. No fielder there so they run two before the fielder in the deep gets to the ball
played towards midwicket again off the back foot
short of a length ball angling into the left-hander from over the wicket, Gambhir cuts from his crease but can't beat point
Gambhir was trying to hit that squarer but fell over a touch and played the fuller ball angling into him towards fine leg
pitches outside leg again but this time Tendulkar doesn't get any bat on it. Pad will do for India though and Gul can't cut off the boundary at fine leg
defended on the off side off the back foot
good length ball on off and middle, defended on the front foot towards the off
Tendulkar cuts a short of a length ball towards cover point and there's a near collision between the fielders
Gambhir twinkles down the pitch and drives to the fielder at cover
strays down leg side, too wide for Gambhir to make contact with the glance
driven towards extra cover where Afridi's attempt to stop it with his shoe isn't too successful
Tendulkar moves forward and defends towards midwicket

lbw! Ian Gould raises the finger and Tendulkar wants a review. There's only one review left. That pitches in line, hits him in line but the replays show that it is likely to miss leg stump. And listen to that roar in Mohali. That looked close. Tendulkar bats on ...

is he stumped this time? Tendulkar lunged forward to play the ball and was beaten by the doosra outside off stump. Akmal whipped off the bails in a flash. Tendulkar's leg had left the ground for a second. Replays show that he might have got it down just in time. Very very close call and Tendulkar bats on again ...
driven off the front foot through extra cover for a single. What an over that was. Pakistan thought thy had Tendulkar twice. He slipped away both times.
Afridi drifts the ball into the right-hander, Tendulkar moves back and defends
pushed on the off side from the crease
tossed up outside off stump, Tendulkar frees his arms and drives but can't beat cover
worked off the pads from deep in his crease behind square
played off the pads through square leg
Tendulkar moves forward and drives the ball through wide mid-on for a single
Ajmal is testing Tendulkar here, he played too early and got a leading edge towards the bowler. Another straighter one.
Tendulkar gets hit on the pad as he tries to work the ball down leg, but that was missing leg stump
played towards midwicket, Tendulkar struggling for fluency against Ajmal
Tendulkar moves forward and pushes towards point and sets off for a quick single. Pakistan need to keep him on strike against Ajmal
Gambhir steps out and tries to hit Ajmal over midwicket. It doesn't happen. What happens is an inside edge on to the pad.
this time Gambhir stays in his crease and uses the pace of Ajmal to play a deft cut that goes fine of the fielder at short third man. Razzaq chases and slides in vain.
dropped, Tendulkar is living a charmed life. He pulls the ball firmly towards midwicket where Misbah attempts to take the catch to his right and drops it. Afridi keeps rather calm ...
driven towards long off for a single, Gambhir played that very straight
tossed up outside off, driven off the front foot once again towards long off
the quicker ball that drifts into the right-hander, Tendulkar nudges off the pads through square leg
Gambhir gets under the ball and chips it towards long on
that was the straighter one and Tendulkar pushed it off the front foot towards point
lands around middle and off and spins away a bit, Gambhir eases it to cover point for a single
Crunchy sweep. That very fine sweep that he plays. He picked it from around middle and swept it fine. He didn't go hard at it; just lapped it around the corner
turns this to short fine-leg fielder
quicker, slightly shorter, turns into off and middle, punched back to the bowler
turning down the leg side, tickled down to short fine-leg fielder

Edged but no slips there. Tendulkar living a charmed innings here. It was the doosra around the off stump line, Tendulkar leaned forward to defend and the ball broke away to take the edge. Tendulkar is clearly not picking Ajmal here. It would have been a simple catch to first slip
leans forward to defend it back down the track
slower, loopy, fullish, Gambhir waits on the front foot and drives to long-on. 100 up
full, very full, on the middle, Tendulkar ensures he doesn't get the front leg in the way and drives it inside out to deep cover
moves down the track and lunges out to push it back to the bowler
it lands outside leg stump, Gambhir sweeps it gently and straight to short fine-leg fielder
gets back, waits for the leg break to arrive, opens the bat-face and steers to backward point for a single
And GAmbhir goes down the track straightaway to drive to deep cover
around the off stump line, TEndulkar pushes outside the line and edges it to the on side of the pitch
quicker, on the middle and leg, Tendulkar gets across to work it past square-leg
Width. Cut. The ball is thrown back from the backward point boundary.
fuller, just outside the leg stump line, Gambhir stabs and the ball rolls through to fine-leg region
leans forward to defend. "Well bowled Hafeez," says Kamran
full outside off, Tendulkar goes hard into the cover drive and edges it to the off
leans forward to defend this leg break to the off
lovely leg break, turning away from the middle and leg line, Tendulkar gets a leading edge to the off as he tries to work it to the leg
That slider! On the off and middle line, Tendulkar pushes it back down the track

Nice ball. But it has gone to the boundary. It was a lot slower, a bit loopier on the middle on a length and Tendulkar went forward and chipped it over the bowler. and it went away to the straight boundary
back to that slider, looking for lbw or an inside edge. Tendulkar presents the full bat face in defense. Good contest on
from round the stumps, on the pads, clipped away for a single
stays back to punch this to short midwicket
on the middle and leg, worked through midwicket for a single
leans forward to dab this to the off side.

Lovely stuff from Hafeez! Beaten in flight and stumped!  Gambhir went down the track but couldn't reach the pitch of the ball. Panic. He then tried to stab the ball away but is now beaten by the turn. More panic. The ball has gone past him and he looks back, trying to get back but no luck. Kamran whips off the bails. India two down.
gets back to work this ball from outside off to midwicket
leans forward to drive past cover, Kamran screams for the throw but the ball hasn't been stopped.
goes for the lbw straightaway with a full delivery on the middle, Virat flicks it away for a single

OMG! Yet another drop! Younis Khan this time. Afridi holds his head. What agony for the Pakistan captain. A sitter too. What a clanger. It was the loopy delivery outside off and TEndulkar drives. The ball goes to right of Younis who stretches his hands out but drops it. Pressure. Tension. Afridi can't believe it
goes down the leg side, brushes the pad
leans forward to push this to the off
leans forward to ease this to long-off
leans well forward to defend
gets back to deflect this to midwicket
gets forward to ping long-on for a single
leans forward to drive this back to the bowler
flighted outside off on a length, driven to Misbah at cover
gets back to work this to midwicket. Another nice tight over
leans forward to drive this to cover

Top shot! Fifty up. Afridi tries to lure Tendulkar into another catch at cover. He flighted it up, slowed it down and tossed it outside off. TEndulkar stretched forward and hit this one over extra cover.
turns away from the off stump line, Tendulkar chases it with a cut shot but misses
lot slower and this one keeps a touch low on the middle and for a moment you were thinking a lbw moment when Tendulkar crouched to work it behind square-leg
on the middle stump line, quicker and Virat pushes it to wide of long-on for a single

What a shot! It was full and just outside off. NO way that looked like it can be cut. Tendulkar pressed back, crouched, opened the bat-face and played the late cut. He steered it through vacant slips.
turns into the middle stump line, worked behind square-leg. They thought about the run - looked an easy run there- but Tendulkar didn't want to take a risk
gets back to punch this down to long-on
quicker one, on the off and middle, Tendulkar gets back to clip it to the leg side for a single
Almost caught and bowled! Kohli was beaten in the flight and that bottom-hand took over completely as he went for the drive. He mistimed the ball back in the air but it falls short of the bowler
dabs this to midwicket
leans forward to drive this flighted delivery to long-off
in the corridor outside off and Virat is beaten, having a lame poke at it
stays back to defend this length delivery back to the bowler
short in length outside off, Virat punches it to sweeper cover
The short ball angling across Tendulkar who steers it to third man. Not quite the hard upper cut- he opted for a horizontal steer this time
gets this from outside off, from short of length and whipped through midwicket
beaten! It was the length delivery in the zone outside off, Tendulkar walked forward and tried to punch it on the up but it went sliding past the edge
turns in to the middle, worked to Younis at backward square-leg
slower, turns into middle again, Virat presses back, arches almost outside leg and punches it down to long-on. Ala Rahul Dravid
gets back to deflect this to short fine-leg region for a single
flighted fuller on the middle, on driven to long-on for a single.
slower, flighted as well, Tendulkar waits and eases it through to long-on
shorter and punched away to long-on. Kamran grunts, "Ohhhhh!"
going away from VIrat who reaches out to steer it to backward point.

Pakistan have taken a catch! Wahab strikes again! Caught at backward point. It landed on a length around off and angled away, Virat played a strange shot as if he was surprised by how it seamed away - Wahab hardly gets the ball to bend in - and had a weak waft at it. He just stabbed at it. Edge and pouched!

Crashing full swinging delivery! Sensational moment! Wahab, who was kept in this game instead of Shoaib, has done the job. What a little big moment. Pakistan huddle is on. It was full, it was pacy and  it swung in beautifully past the hurried stab and crashed into the stumps. Clatter! It didn't land at all. He just took  the pitch out of the equation
Almost! Kamran even throws in an appeal! Dhoni walked down the track and across towards off and sparred at it. The ball flashed past the edge
Edged away Another one slanting across Dhoni who jabs it to thrid man boundary. What a over so far.
lands around leg, moves in towards leg and middle, stabbed back to the bowler. "End of a magnificent over," says AThers and who can argue with that. Gem of an over.
gets back to deflect this to square-leg
just outside the off stump, Dhoni was steering it towards gully, partly edged and partly steered and it runs through to thirdman boundary
a weak walk across and he stabs this one way to the off. Very edgy
lunges forward to defend this to the off
stretches forward to push this back to the bowler
slower and Dhoni taps this to the bowler
stays back to punch it wide of backward point for a single
on the leg and middle line, Dhoni went back to punch it through wide mid-on region and they run hard to come back for the third run
Beaten again! Sachin Lucky Tendulkar! It was in the zone outside off and TEndulkar tries to open the bat-face and pokes at it.
fuller and Tendulkar leans ever so gracefully forward and across to drive it to cover
tries to perhaps get this one back in and pushes it outside leg.
Umar Gul is living a nightmare out there. It was glanced to him at fine-leg and what does he do? He slides an awkward slide and the ball rolls of his thigh to the boundary.
leans forward and across to punch this to sweeper cover
goes so back and across to push it from the middle to the leg side
And again. Well this time it was a touch slower and that allowed Tendulkar the time to work the wrists over time and send it behind square-leg
threatens to paddle sweep and HAfeez adjusts! Dhoni too adjusts to the change in line and pace to stab it to the leg side
leans forward to defend this to the on sdie
slower, on the off and middle line, tapped back to the bowler
stretches well forward to defend to the off
gets back to dab this to short third man. No slip in
slower, bit more bounce on this from short of length, Tendulkar waits on the back foot and cuts to deep point

Dropped again Shahid Afridi holds his head again! Dropped by Kamran. Tough chance, though. It was the leg break and Tendulkar edged his defensive push. The ball deviated a lot and Kamran couldn't move his hands to his right in time. Tough chance for Kamran's standards. How many is too many? So many lives!
leans forward to defend to the off
Lovely shot! It was a nice leg break outside off and Tendulkar waited on that front foot and square drove it inside out over the off-side field to pick up four
gets back to dab this to right of short fine-leg fielder
stays back to steer the length delivery through point for a single
slower, on the middle, Dhoni waits before he clips to square-leg fielder
fetches it from outside off and paddled it to fine-leg
gets back to punch this to midwicket
on the off stump line, Tendulkar tries to dab it to the leg and gets a leading edge, back along the track
leans forward to ease it back to the bowler
short in length outside off stump, Dhoni tries to punch it to the off but is too early with the shot and the ball wobbles past the bat
again goes hard into the punchy shot, again too early with that and mistimes it to deep cover
Two-paced wicket all right. This time Tendulkar gets a bottom edge, trying to push it to point for a single. The ball rolls behind the wicket
full in length, just outside off, Tendulkar pushes it to  mid-off
gets back, steers it  to left of backward point, looks for a run but Umar makes a neat diving stop.
short in length, on the middle, turned to right of Younis at midwicket. TEndulkar wants a single. And they change their mind. Wise decision.
gets back to punch this to long-on
leans forward to turn this from around off stump to midwicket
moves down the track but Hafeez is alert; shortens the length and Tendulkar pushes it through to long-on
lunges forward to defend this to the leg side
stretches forward to push it to the off side of the pitch. "Well bowled Hafeez," says Kamran. And adds, "C'mon boys!"
flighted around the middle stump line, defended to the leg side
nicely driven, on the up, but straight to short extra cover
bottom-edged cut! The ball went nowhere near the wicket - it had been delivered short and wide - but a brief moment of alarm all the same. Is it already keeping low?
tip-and-run from Sachin, as he leans into a defensive stroke and scrambles a single while the ball rolls to backward point. He's run well today, real hustle
short and rising from Gul, Dhoni stands tall and pulls to midwicket ... and he's overstepped! A front foot no-ball, and a free hit coming up
attempted paddle sweep from Sachin as Gul spears this one in full and fast, Sachin misses however, the ball strikes pad and rolls to short fine leg
Gul sprints in with intent and fires one down on a length, Dhoni nudges to mid-on
very full but wide of off, dug out on the drive but it's toe-ended and rolls away harmlessly
nice and full, not much flight but a hint of drift. Tapped to square leg
Tendulkar shuffles down the wicket this time, but Hafeez spots him coming and re-adjusts the length
whipped out to deep midwicket with flair, Tendulkar raising the right leg off the ground as he plays the shot. There's a fielder out there
arrowed in flat on off stump, Tendulkar makes room and slaps it out to deep cover
again Tendulkar dances down, slightly misjudging the line to be struck on the pad ... a very optimistic appeal from Hafeez is quickly turned down

dropped again! What on earth is happening out there? Tendulkar tried a whip-pull to midwicket, popping the ball in the air ... Umar Akmal is there for the shot at a wide midwicket, times the jump and gets both hands to it, and it pops out! Hafeez is fuming, Afridi is utterly disconsolate. That's the fourth drop!
wrong 'un from Afridi, picked and defended to leg
pushed gently into the gap at cover, quick single
a touch too full, driven out to the cover sweeper
is there glue on the soles of Dhoni's shoes? He's stuck to the crease and jabs a quick legspinner awkwardly into the off side
nudged back to the bowler
tight finish to the over, zoning in on off stump and Dhoni defends
doosra, Tendulkar flashes and a thick edge bounces to the man at short third man
offspinner this time, flicked to backward square leg
Tendulkar presents the full face of the bat on the drive to send the ball to long-off
nudged back towards the bowler with no great intent
worked slightly wider this time, and as midwicket runs across there's time for a quick single

finally, they've held one! Sachin falls. And guess who's there to take the catch? Afridi drops to his left to hold onto a stinging drive at short extra cover. 'If you want the job done right, then do it yourself,' he's thinking. Possibly. Relief flows visibly over the Pakistanis as they gather at the fall of the wicket. Plenty of smiles out there now
slammed down the ground for one
straight and flat, Raina defends
that looked like an offspinner, pitching outside leg and turning in towards the pad
Raina attempts a little glance to short fine leg, but the fielder runs round in good time to stop the single
Raina sweeps out to deep square leg to get off the mark
the end of another very tight over from Afridi, Dhoni can't work this away
chipped in the air to wide long-on

a slightly wild swipe across the line from Raina, the ball was a little short but not short enough for that shot. Just the single as the ball rolls out to midwicket. The odd one is definitely keeping low for the spinners
Dhoni leans well forward and allows ball to hit bat, angling the blade to get the ball to short fine leg. Good one-day batting, and another quick single
Raina plays very deep in the crease to get Ajmal excited, but lays bat on ball
full on off stump, pushed into the covers for one
Dhoni, now without cap or helmet, waits on a fast, flat offspinner and tucks it wide of short fine leg for one
Afridi attacks the stumps, Dhoni stretches down the wicket and drives cautiously into the off side
this has been a confident start from Raina, and now he picks the half volley and whips it out to deep midwicket for two more
Raina is down on bended knee to drive, but he picks out the man at cover
again this looked like the offspinner rather than the wrong 'un, turning across the left-hander as he flicks square

huge appeal from Afridi as Dhoni lunges forward and is struck on the pad! Taufel says no ... but Afridi asks for the review all the same. But he's going to be disappointed, as there's a huge inside edge. A wasted review. Trust the Taufel!
speared in very flat, Dhoni eases down the ground to bring up India's 200. And that run rate is back to five an over
a thick inside edge ricochets off the pad and rolls to midwicket, allowing them to steal a quick single
Raina gets back and across and glances to Afridi's right at short fine leg

Dhoni doesn't look to be in the best of nick! He thrusts the bat out more in hope than anything else, not sure he's picking Ajmal's variations. A leading edge loops into space at cover, and they get a single. "Scratchy, like chalk on a chalkboard," says George Binoy
defended off the back foot
Raina stretches forward to defend another good ball, Ajmal staying round the wicket to him
tapped gently into the covers to end the over
gosh, an ugly jab bobbles into the covers, feet and hands going everywhere

edged and dropped! Kamran it is, a thick edge flies to his right, hitting the fingers and bouncing out. That was a really tough chance, there's no slip in so he's got to go for it, he stretches into the dive ... but can't hold on!
back of a length and rising, Raina gets across to off and glances off the hip

well, that's one way to take the faulty catching out of the equation! Dhoni is rapped on the pad as he shuffles to off, huge appeal and Taufel has given him out! Dhoni wants a review though ... but it's not going to help, three reds as it pitches and hits him in line, definitely hitting the stumps and that's gone. India's hopes of making a defendable total are beginning to evaporate here
on a length, seaming away, and tapped to point
definite reverse swing from Riaz, snaking deceptively through the air at a good pace to zip past the outside edge of Harbhajan's bat
Ajmal stays round the wicket to Raina, who stretches forward to defend
flicked to short fine leg for a single
doosra and Bhajji is absolutely bamboozled! Didn't pick that at all, playing for turn where there was none, beaten
a looping top edge on the sweep! But it falls safely, and they take a single
tapped into the covers
confusion in the running! Raina chops to point, both batsmen set off, stop, look at each other, run again and the stop mid-pitch ... Raina turns and is back just in time! The is nervous stuff
swiped out into the deep on the leg side, and they're back for the second
Riaz loses his radar, sending this one down the leg side
that's better, nicely straight this time to draw a defensive stroke from Harbhajan
Kamran saves runs! Again Riaz sends one down the leg side, this one went even further and was heading for four wides ... until Kamran leapt athletically to his left to stop it one-handed
fuller, and outside off this time. Harbhajan steps forward and drives into the covers
edged and dropping short of Kamran! This one kept low, touched the edge and dropped a metre in front of the keeper ... who is perhaps a little deep with the ball keeping low fairly often now
Riaz attacks the stumps, with a hint of shape through the air, but Raina meets the ball with the full face of the blade to send it down to long-on

Riaz steams in from round the wicket to Bhajji, banging this one in fairly short. It spits up, going with the angle towards leg stump and strikes the batsman on the hip, looping towards short fine leg. Bhajji was looking for the paddle-pull but couldn't connect
Ajmal comes round the wicket, firing one flat at the toes and Raina flicks to midwicket ... he wants two, but just the single
Harbhajan sweeps, it comes off the glove and balloons to gully ... no fielder is close enough
flapped back to the bowler
this time he connects with the sweep! That's hit uppishly but well-placed, beating short fine leg and deep square. First boundary for the best part of 15 overs
this'll be wides, speared down the leg side, the ball strikes Kamran's glove and rolls to fine leg. Ajmal isn't happy
good ball! Arrowed in very full outside off, a great yorker and it slips right under Raina's bat. Too wide to be of danger to the stumps, but it's a dot ball
Raina skips down the wicket to take the ball on the full and whips out to deep midwicket
lifted majestically down the ground! Dead straight, powerfully hit. It was a length ball from Gul, and Raina got nicely underneath it
this time he aims for the yorker, but it slips down the leg side. A hint of wobble through the air, that delivery would be dangerous if he could get it on target

full toss this time, and Raina is taken a little by surprise, driving back to the bowler. Gul hasn't been quite at his best today, but a low full toss is at least better than a length ball at this stage
hmm, or maybe not! Another full toss from Gul but this time it's dished up wide of off. Raina drives, picking the gap in the field to pick up four
a better ball, but the damage has already been done in this over. With the field set back on the off side, Raina eases a very full ball to long-off for one
four runs to fine leg! Gul is losing it here, another full toss and this time it's misdirected down the leg side, a deflection off the bat and it beats Kamran
dot ball to finish, very full and reversing to beat the bat, but wide of off. India really needed an over like that
good stuff from Ajmal, spearing in the arm ball to cramp Raina for room. He taps back down the wicket, and Ajmal runs across to deny the single
a touch too full, Raina steps forward and drives to long-on
well, Harbhajan wasn't picked the doosra when he first came in but he seems to be doing so now. Defended

doosra, missed and stumped! Harbhajan jumped down the wicket and aimed for the straight boundary, but ran straight past the ball and is easily stumped by several metres. Ajmal the clear winner in the battle between the two offspinners
yet another doosra, Zaheer steps forward and defends into space at cover, and Raina immediately calls for the single
Ajmal comes round the wicket, zoning in on leg stumps and Raina flicks off the pads to keep strike
... and immediately validates the decision with a superb, swinging yorker! Raina manages to get something in the way of the ball, and they sprint through for a leg bye
hmm, interesting shot from Zaheer, he clears the left leg and then flings the bat out, apparently with his eyes shut. Doesn't get close to laying bat on ball

well, same shot this time he manages to get bat on ball but that is a shocking effort! The ball loops up, and Zaheer is lucky to survive as it drops safely in the deep near cover. They're back for the second
Riaz switches to round the wicket and attempts to fire in the yorker, but it's too far outside off
Zaheer is batting like a No. 11 out there, again he clears the left leg and swings the bat in hope. Past the outside edge. Well, no danger of the lbw at least!

this is comedic stuff! How has he hit that for four? Riaz fires one in full and fast, and it's a case of ball hitting bat, a leading edge loops over the infield and rolls to the wide third man boundary. Well, they're runs no matter how you get them
another ungainly swipe, Zaheer backing away to leg, and he hits nothing but fresh air. This is crazy batting
swinging yorker, right on the toes! Raina gets an inside edge on it, and that looks to be heading for the fine leg boundary ... but no! Riaz dives at short fine to cut it off
another full toss and Zaheer, backing away to leg, manages to carve into the off side to get Raina back on strike
full toss again, but it's low. Raina attempts to heave it down the ground, but the ball hits the toe of the bat, making a weak, woody sound, and falls well short of the man at long-on
Zaheer slams a full toss down the ground ... and another great piece of fielding from Pakistan! Younis Khan it is this time, sliding across from long-off to save runs. Still, 250 up for India
yet another full toss, Raina drives along the ground to wide long-off ... they take on the fielder's arm, Umar Akmal it is out there, and they're back for the second!
shot! Raina walks across to off stump, and picks a half-volley up and over fine leg ... the fielder is inside the circle there, and once it was past him it was four
predictably, Zaheer clears the left leg, shuts the eyes and swings ... nowhere near it. He just needs to lay bat on ball!

gone! Caught behind, it was only a matter of time. Another enormous heave, this time he does lay bat on ball but it's a thin edge and safely pouched by Kamran. Five wickets for Wahab Riaz in a World Cup semi-final!
Nehra does the right thing, just putting bat to ball and taking a single to gully
full, fast and swinging! Raina jams down on it to send the ball to long-on

Nehra's been watching too much of Zaheer! A big swing, nowhere near it ... but Raina calls him through for one! Kamran throws to Riaz, who runs back and takes the bails off, Nehra doesn't bother to dive, easily run out
powerfully drive to wide long-off, but Ajmal sprints across and slides, cutting the ball off just inside the boundary to keep them to two

inn2.comm: Cracking start from Kamran. He loves to square drive. He leaned forward to a length delivery angling away from him and drove it through cover point
drives this one back down the track but Zaheer intercepts with his right hand.
fuller, on the middle and leg line, Kamran falls over a touch on that front foot and stabs it away to the leg side.
That one kept low. It was in the zone outside off stump and Kamran crouches and tries to push it away but gets no contact
on the middle stump line and Kamran drives it neatly to mid-off. He is looking to be very positive here.
Top shot! Crunchy! It was a length delivery on the middle stump line and Kamran drove it on the up and through the line, right past the umpire. Fab hit.
Slip and short midwicket in. on the off stump line, from a good length,. Hafeez offers the full bat-face as he pushes it to the off side
angles this away from Hafeez, who pushes away from the body, and runs it down to third man

ooh .... that almost took out the off stump. It was a length delivery that perhaps just about held its line outside off .. Kamran pushed outside the line and the ball went through the bat and pad gap and just past the off stump
goes for the short delivery, on the leg stump line, Kamran mistimes the pull and the ball rolls behind square-leg
on the hips. tucked away uppishly but in the gap through backward square-leg region
leans well forward to push this to the off side
Loverly drive through covers. Kamran is in some mood. He leaned well forward - Zaheer was bowling from round the stumps- and caressed it through extra cover.
stays round the stumps for Hafeez as well. Full and just outside off stump, Hafeez square drives towards point.
Ah! nice! It was not a bad delivery at all. It came in towards the middle, Hafeez ensures his front leg doesn't come in the way, stays back, opens up a bit, and clips this through midwicket
Close run. It was pushed towards Sachin at mid-off and they rushed across but Sachin doesn't pick the ball. The batsman would have made it in time, even if he had I guess
stays back to punch this sweetly but its intercepted at point

leans well forward to drive to the off side, the short cover fielder lunges to make a half stop. The ball rolls to mid-off. Kamran had started for the run and had to get back. Tendulkar with the throw and Kamran gets back in time
Supah shot! Caressed away in some style. It was a length delivery outside off stump and HAfeez leaned forward and across to drive it through extra cover. No violence. Pure timing. Treat to watch
the slower one, around off stump line, defended towards point

another off cutter, Hafeez stays back to push it to the off side. There is a fumble there and the batsmen think ok may be here is a chance for a single. Virat had fumbled at cover but the ball went to mid-off and the batsmen return
slower one on the pads, worked through midwicket. They think about the second run but kill the thought.
on the middle and leg, Kamran works it past square-leg for a single
a length delivery just outside off, Hafeez presses his weight back, opens the bat-face and punch-steers it sweetly to left of backward point where Yuvraj stops it on the rebound
oh a lovely leg cutter! It landed on a length around off and zagged away sharply. Surprised Kamran who pushed out at it and the ball went past the edge
Kamran dashes down the track, Munaf picks it and bangs it shorter. Kamran defends, Munaf stares.
Tries the bouncer, good one just outside off , and Kamran goes for the pull. Heart in the mouth moment. He top edged it but the ball sailed clear of mid-on fielder. Dhoni applauds.
on the off stump line, from a length, Kamran defends it to the off side.
full in length just outside off stump and Kamran square drives uppishly. The cover fielder jumped in anticipation of a catch at point but the ball fell short of the point fielder.
leans forward to push this one to cover. Fine tight over from Munaf
the off cutter on the middle and off line, pushed out to the off side. Hafeez then does that off-cutter release style. He is aware all right.
this one is a seam-up delivery outside off stump, punched out to the off where Raina stops
another off cutter, this time on the leg and middle line, clipped to right of midwicket where Sehwag makes a diving save

Another off cutter, Hafeez punches it slightly uppishly as he checked the shot. It flew towards but fell short of Nehra who dived. The ball, after bouncing, brushed Nehra's hands and crashed into the stumps at the other end. A run out appeal ensues. But Kamran was home. Third ump confirms.
around the off stump line, punched out to Virat at cover
slower cutter on the middle and leg, whipped away to Munaf at deep midwicket region
full in length just outside off, driven crisply but straight to mid-off. He then practices that shot again, this time he leans more into it
in the zone outside off stump, Hafeez shoulders arms. Dhoni collects and Hafeez remarks his guard with his boot.
Whack! Up and over point. It was a short of length delivery outside off and Hafeez plays a cracking shot. It wasn't the horizontal cut; he punched it up and over in some style. Misbah applauds
fuller and Hafeez drives neatly but again straight to Tendulkar at mid-off. Time for some gardening down the track for Hafeez
full in length, tapped towards Tendulkar at mid-off for a single

Uppish but through the gap. It was a length delivery outside off, Kamran went for the off drive but ended up slicing it a bit. The ball flew right through the gap between mid-off and extra cover. Catch it was the cry but ...
full in length just outside off, pushed out to mid-off.
slower one outside off, pushed out to the off
Risky but well executed. It was slightly short in length around off stump and Hafeez just whips it away in the air but well to the right of mid-on. Wonderfully done in the end.
the off cutter and this one breaks away from the middle and off and ends up outside off, pushed out to the off side
on the middle stump line, pushed to right of Piyush Chawla, subbing for Gambhir, at mid-on
full in length on the middle stump line, defended to the off side
in the zone outside off stump, Hafeez shifts his weight back and plays a nice punchy shot to left of point where Virat makes a lunging stop
it was the slower one just outside off stump, Hafeez sees the slightly short of length and goes for the pull shot. But ends up edging it to his body
Another inside edge. This one was another slower one and well outside off, Hafeez went hard into the back-foot drive and edged it behind the stumps
The third slower one in a row; Hafeez pushes it to short cover
a length delivery, seam-up, this time on the middle, calmly tapped to right of mid-on

Done in by the slower one. And also done by his own favourite square drive. It was full and outside off stump, Kamran couldn't resist the temptation and reached out for his square drive. But he ended up slicing it straight to point.

full in length around off stump line and Hafeez plays a lovely off drive. Pure timing again. He has played beautifully so far. Harbhajan had to put in a dive to his left at mid-off if he was to stop it. He didn't. Four.
length delivery around off stump, punched to left of short extra cover and the cover fielder stops
full, too full again, driven to cover. He started off with a fab leg cutter from a good length but now is bowling a touch too full.
this time lands it on the good length and Hafeez drives it back down the track. Munaf is so eager to stop and stare at the batsman that he doesn't stop it cleanly! He does glare though!
just outside off stump, pushed out to short extra cover

Munaf tries the bouncer. Hafeez goes for the aerial pull. Zaheer was there at deep midwicket but he was caught in two minds. Whether to go for the improbable catch or stop the boundary. He does neither. He moved forward and then realised he was nowhere close to the catch. He then slid to his left to stop but couldn't get his body behind the ball.
flighted full on the middle, turned to midwicket
Slip in place and Harbhajan tosses this on a length outside off, eased down to long-on

Almost caught and bowled! It was a well-tossed up delivery that dipped on the batsman who chipped it back down the track. Harbhajan lunges to his right but it falls just short of his palms. Could he have dived?
Another good delivery. THis one turns in from outside off, Hafeez goes for the cut. Mistake. And inside edges it to his pad
gets back to clip this to the on side for a single
nicely slowed up, flighted as well, just outside off, worked to midwicket. Good start from Harbhajan.
No slip in. leg cutter in the zone outside off stump line, left alone
shortish delivery on the middle and leg, Hafeez drag-pulls it to the fine-leg boundary.
hurls a leg cutter in the corridor outside off, left alone
leans  forward to squeeze this to point
in the corridor outside off, pushed out to point.
on a length around off, pushed to left of Nehra at mid-on for a easy single.
turns in from outside off, defended towards midwicket
leans well forward to defend the flighted delivery back to the bowler
slower, on the middle, Hafeez gets back to push it down to long-on
slightly quicker, turns in to the middle, perhaps stops a touch on the batsman who checks his shot and chips it uppishly to the right of the non-striker
leans forward to squeeze this to the left of Harbhajan who makes a mess of regulation stop.
spins in to the middle line, tapped with the turn to fine-leg region
in the zone outside off stump, Asad plays a loose drive and the ball cuts away past the edge.
just outside off stump, pushed to right of point where Yuvraj dives to stop.
fuller, just outside off stump, quicker, dug out back to Munaf for a "crowd catch"
full in length on the middle stump line, Asad, yet to get going, mistimes the drive to mid-on
leg cutter in the zone outside off stump, Asad is beaten again, trying to drive on the up
full in length and its driven to mid-on
turns in to the leg stump line, dabbed past square-leg. Slip and leg slip in
Smashed! He tried the topspinner but landed it short. And outside off. Asad goes back to crash it through covers.
fetches this from outside off to paddle it to fine-leg region for a single
slip and leg slip in and this ball spins in to the middle, keeps a touch slow, pushed to midwicket
leans forward to defend this towards midwicket
nicely flighted up, on a length outside off, inviting a drive and Asad edges it to behind square-leg
just outside off stump, pushed to right of point where Yuvraj stops and fires a throw at the non striker's end
lands on a good length outside off and moves away fractionally. Hafeez cuts. Thin air. Dhoni collects.

What was Hafeez thinking? Again, yet again, a lovely 30 -40 and he has combusted. He went for a paddle sweep, yeah a paddle sweep, to a full delivery outside off stump and edged it to Dhoni. Oh dear. Pressure? or over confidence?
Munaf pitches on a good length on middle stump, Younis plays towards midwicket. Ten dots in a row for Munaf
good length and very straight, Younis defends on the front foot
driving length outside off and Younis eases it through cover off the front foot
Shafiq charges and hits Harbhajan hard into the ground, the ball bounces over the bowler, who jumped in vain, and Zaheer doesn't bother diving to his right at mid-off
played towards midwicket
the batsman moves back and punches towards the bowler
Shafiq moves deep into his crease and drives towards long on
Younis moves outside the off stump to defend on the front foot. He was looking to play on the leg
defended on the front foot once again
Shafiq pushes the ball off the front foot with an open face towards point
fuller length on leg stump, nudged off the front foot towards the fielder at midwicket
a touch slower and Shafiq chips it in the air through square leg. Zaheer is the man on the boundary and Pakistan take advantage of him and run the second
this time it's flicked straight to Zaheer on the deep square boundary, he doesn't have to do much running, so just the single
Younis doesn't move his feet and has a fish outside off stump at a length delivery that slants across him, gets beaten
too straight but Younis can't do much with it but nudge towards midwicket
a bit too short and Shafiq cuts off the back foot to Nehra at deep point
Younis moves forward and a touch towards the off side before driving a full ball towards long on
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
Shafiq gets down on one knee and plays the paddle sweep in the air, but there's no man at short fine leg
played down to long on once again
tossed up outside off, driven back to the bowler
starts with a very long hop which is pulled straight to the man on the deep square leg boundary, loose ball
Shafiq goes back and across to whip the ball through the leg side again
played off the back foot towards long-on, Yuvraj's length is a bit short at the moment
that turned a bit, played towards deep cover off the back foot
nice drift into the right-hander, fuller length and straighter line. Defended on the front foot
a touch too short again, allowing Younis to wait and push towards long-off
length ball slanting across the right-hander from over the wicket, Younis dabs towards point and wants one, Shafiq sends him back
fuller length and Younis drives towards wide mid off where Yuvraj moves to his left and tumbles, he manages to stop the ball
full ball on the pads, clipped crisply off the pads through square leg, Munaf runs rather well from long leg and picks up
good length ball angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, played off the pads towards midwicket
Shafiq prods outside off at one that pitches and holds its line outside off, he gets beaten
that would have been a risky single had Yuvraj picked up at mid-off, but he didn't. Shafiq punched that nicely off the front foot and decided he could take Yuvraj
too short again from Yuvraj, cut off the back foot through point
that stopped after pitching and turned slightly, Younis moved back and then had to reach out for it to push on the off
played uppishly towards backward point where Kohli doesn't field cleanly
Younis plays to Kohli at backward point again
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover, Raina cuts it off from cover
played back to the bowler off the front foot
Zaheer angles the ball into the right-hander, Shafiq moves forward and opens the face to steer towards third man
Zaheer appeals for lbw but Taufel says not out, that surely pitched outside leg and thudded into the pad after Younis missed the shot across the line
another fumble in the field - Chawla at square leg - after Younis flicks the ball off his hips
width outside off stump and Shafiq cuts towards deep point where Harbhajan runs to his left and picks up with one hand
too full on the pads, Pakistan reach 100, Shafiq played a crisp flick towards deep square leg where Munaf fields
played with an open face towards point
played off the back foot through square leg where Zaheer has to lumber in off the boundary, the batsmen settle for one
nudged off the front foot towards the on side, Dhoni runs to prevent the single
played with soft hands towards Kohli's right at point and the batsmen go for it. Kohli needed a direct hit to get Younis, he didn't score it
played towards square leg for one more

whoops! Shafiq's gone. Too straight and a touch too full to cut, Shafiq went back and tried to, he missed and the ball skidded straight past him and hit middle stump, the Indians get into a huddle. He was cramped for room and short of time to play that shot
Misbah defends tentatively on the front foot, that didn't hit the middle of the bat
Younis moves forward and drives towards midwicket
Younis goes right back and defends on the off side
moves forward and towards the off to drive to long on
Misbah moves forward and nudges the ball off his pads, there is a fielder at leg slip and the ball falls just short
swept towards long leg and Misbah gets going
an attempted cut off the back foot ends up as a bottom edge into the ground towards short third man
Yuvraj drifts the ball into the right-hander and beats the off drive with vicious turn, Dhoni fails to collect cleanly. No edge though
defended on the off side
Younis lunges forward and pushes towards cover

caught at cover! A slow ball on a good length outside off, inviting Younis forward and into the drive. He takes the bait and spoons the ball towards Raina who leaps and takes the catch at head height. India are back in this ...
another slow ball drifting into the right-hander, defended on the front foot
big turn at very slow pace outside off, Akmal strides forward and lets it go
Misbah pushes forward with hard hands and gets a leading edge towards point
Akmal drops the ball off the back foot behind point, he played that with soft hands but Misbah says no to the run
too quick and too short from Harbhajan, played towards deep point for two
too short from Harbhajan, has he been watching Yuvraj? Played towards cover for a quick single
fuller length and Misbah strides forward and plays the sweep towards long leg
Akmal goes right back and uses Harbhajan's shorter length to work the ball off his pads
tossed up on middle stump, Misbah leans forward and drives towards long off

what's happened there? Yuvraj has broken the stumps with the hand and Dhoni missed. Misbah played the sweep towards fine leg, where Yusuf picked up and fired the return to Dhoni. Akmal wanted the third and had run a long way to the striker's end. Dhoni collected and fired a flat throw to Yuvraj, who messed it up
played off the back foot towards the off
driven through cover point off the back foot
played off the pads towards midwicket
nudged between midwicket and square leg for another single. Pakistan showing lot of urgency in their running
Nehra cuts the ball across the right-hander from an excellent length, Akmal was squared up and beaten
was that an edge? Sounded like one as Akmal swished at a wide delivery outside off and was beaten. No appeal from anyone though
tight line and length from over the wicket angling across the right-hander, played towards point off the back foot
Nehra wishes he was Brett Lee as Akmal nudges that ball towards his right and sets off for a quick single
Nehra is skidding balls at very low height across the batsmen, Misbah lets it go and the ball bounces a second time and Dhoni does well to collect cleanly
good length and much closer to the batsman, Misbah prods and is beaten. Pressure mounting
that is a big moment, Akmal releases the pressure by charging and hitting inside out over extra cover, hit placed that superbly
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
terrific shot! Massive pressure released again. Akmal picks up the short length early, rocks back, and hammers the ball with brute force over deep midwicket. First six of the game
pushed off the front foot towards the off side
blocked off the front foot, Yuvraj is back to a fuller length
Misbah gets down on one knee and paddle sweeps. Massive over for Pakistan.
Misbah pushes off the front foot towards cover and thinks about a single, Akmal sends him back
Nehra pitches outside leg and allows Misbah to work the ball off his pads towards square leg, Chawla runs in swiftly and makes a clean pick up to prevent the second
short of a length ball cramps Akmal for room, he jumps on the back foot and plays the ball towards long leg
nudged from the crease towards midwicket
good length and very straight, the batsman defends from the crease towards the off side
Misbah uses the angle across him to steer the ball and makes good contact, can't beat point though
Akmal gets on to the front foot and blocks towards the leg side, Dhoni fields
Akmal begisn to charge but changes his mind and plays a risky cut from the stumps through point, aggressive running and the Indians are helpless to prevent the second

Akmal has decided Yuvraj has to go, he charges the spinner, gets under the ball and hammers it over the sight screen, he took one hand off the bat even and it still went miles, is he turning the game?
Yuvraj has to bowl shorter and flatter not and Akmal cuts towards deep point, Akmal has messed with Yuvraj's length
defended on the front foot towards cover
blocked off the front foot toward the leg side, Dhoni is quick enough to prevent one
Akmal moves forward and runs a short of a length ball from outside off towards third man
Misbah defends from his crease and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Misbah stays rooted to his crease and dabs the length ball towards point
Misbah gets drawn in to the forward lunge and gets beaten by a slower ball that seams away from him outside off
a fuller ball outside off, Misbah drives off the front foot, Munaf reaches out with his left hand and stops it
Munaf ends a terrific over with a length delivery around off stump. Misbah defends on the off side

bowled 'im! Bhajji strikes straight away, it wasn't the doosra - more of an arm ball - but Umar played it horribly, neither forward nor back and swishing hopefully through the line of the ball. It nipped past the bat and clattered into the off stump
spin for Bhajji, played to the leg side
nicely driven, but stopped by a diving cover fielder
tapped off the back foot, into the off side
nudged into space at square leg, and they sprint through
Harbhajan comes back over the wicket, leg slip moves to a regular slip position, and Razzaq defends
legcutter, defended carefully towards cover point
this one nips back in off the seam, again Misbah can't get it away. He can barely get it off the square at the moment!
nice and straight from Munaf, good length too, and Misbah taps to midwicket
a touch fuller from Munaf, closer to off stump, and all Misbah can do is tap it back to the bowler
Munaf aims for the yorker, but it slips out a very low, dipping full toss outside off. Misbah jams the bat down to get it to third man
Munaf goes full again, this time he slips towards leg stump however and Razzaq tucks him easily through square leg
lobbed up on off stump, gentle spin away and it's nudged to point
Yuvraj comes round the wicket, tossing it up once more, and again Razzaq taps quietly into the off side
Razzaq steps deep into the crease, working a straighter ball to square leg
floated up full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
this is gentle stuff from Yuvraj, but it's doing the job. Misbah stretches forward to defend
finally a run, forced down the ground for a single
is Misbah starting to find the middle of the bat? Full and straight, and he drives stylishly down to long on
Razzaq steps to leg, giving himself room, and swishes wildly outside off ... the ball cuts away to beat him. Taufel's called that wide, but it's a bit harsh
gone! Bowled! Munaf sends down a slower ball, another legcutter, and Razzaq plays down completely the wrong line to lose his off stump. India surge ahead with that wicket, they've got control now.
full on off stump, cutting away and keeping low. Afridi taps to cover and looks for a single - but there is none
flicked uppishly down to long-on, and he's off the mark. Plenty of bottom hand in the shot
Misbah walks into a defensive stroke, dropping the ball towards point
this pitch continues to get slower and lower, Misbah was too soon into the drive here but the ball is chipped safely down to long on for one
driven in the air once again, but threading the gap at cover ... and they're back for a second run
flighted up on off stump, Misbah stretches out and unfurls a forward defensive that would not be out of place in a Test match
this one rushes on with the arm, Misbah nudges in front of square on the leg side for a single
thrashed through cover! Immense power in the shot, it was pitched up and Afridi scythed through the line to send the ball screaming to the cover boundary
full and on the toes, whipped through midwicket
again this one goes on with the arm from round the wicket, Afridi steps back in his crease and works to midwicket ... he's initially hesitant about a second run, but some slovenly fielding allows it
good start, he rushes in and hits a good length on off stump, beating the outside edge as Misbah tries to slash to third man
straighter this time, on a length and Misbah defends with minimal foot movement
fuller, driven down to long-off
Zaheer is going to attack Afridi's stumps here. This one is slightly off line, but the intent is there
slammed down the ground, but the fielder on the boundary sprints round to cut it off
slower ball, the cutter, and it's chopped to cover point with little timing
another slower ball, this time Afridi finds a gap on the off side for a single
Afridi jumps down the track, hitting the ball on the full toss down to long-on
where has that come from? Misbah reverse sweeps, beating a diving short third man, and picks up his first boundary!
again the reverse sweep, finer this time, but short third man zips across to cut it off

Is that out? If it is it is a stunning piece of fielding from Ashish Nehra! Afridi pulled in the air out to deep midwicket, he charged across and leapt ... India celebrate, but Ashish immediately says he's not sure. And they go upstairs ... Yep, that's bounced just in front of him. Still a wonderful effort in the field from someone who's not usually known for it
nudged into the leg side
Nehra again! Afridi slashes, the ball flies off a thick edge and bounces away towards third man ... but Nehra dives across at short third man and keeps them to one
inswinging yorker! Well, not quite, a touch too full, and is whipped behind square on the leg side. Definite movement through the air though, back in to the right-hander
short on middle and off, Misbah steps back and pulls, turning his wrists on the shot to keep it down
again Nehra does the job in the field! Afridi slams a length delivery to mid-on, Nehra has a split second to move to his left and does so, stopping it. The ball is following him around!
low full toss, Afridi chips it up and over midwicket, and it falls safely in front of the fielder out there
very full, and straight too. Misbah drives straight back to the bowler
this looked slower through the air, dipping on the batsman at the last moment. Misbah nudges through square leg for a single
Bhajji comes round the wicket, Misbah nurdles straight to the fielder on the leg side and for some reason both he and Afridi look eager for a single. Absolutely no chance
glanced very fine down the leg side, short fine runs round to keep them to one
Bhajji switches to over the wicket for Afridi, who dances down the track and slaps a full toss down to wide long-on
fired down full and flat outside off, Afridi leaves alone, perhaps hoping for a wide ... that was well within the line though

gone! Harbhajan sends down a high full toss, Afridi attempts to smash it baseball-style down the ground but the ball takes the top edge and swirls up for cover to take an easy catch. The captain departs, he had to go for his shots but couldn't execute that one too well. This is India's game now
full and straight, pushed carefully into the leg side
past the outside edge! Suddenly Nehra's found a bit more zip off the wicket, that could well be his fastest ball of the evening
Riaz thrusts the bat out, looking for a single to gully, but backward point cuts it off
just short of a good length, Riaz paddle-pulls out to Tendulkar at deep midwicket
whipped off the pads down to fine leg
Riaz finds the boundary! Unorthodox but effective. He backs away to leg, Nehra follows him and he's cramped for room but gets a good connection on a bottom-handed swipe that races to wide long-on
speared down the leg side by Nehra, that's a wide
cutter from Nehra, and it's a good one! The ball grips and turns from leg to off, taking the leading edge of Riaz's bat and rolling into the covers
Harbhajan comes round the wicket and misdirects one fast and flat down the leg side ... but Riaz gets bat on it, so it's just a single to short fine leg. That could well have been five wides
another reverse sweep from Misbah, and he places it perfectly! He used the extra pace as Harbhajan fired down another quicker one, getting it fine of the man at short third man
worked off the pad to short fine leg, and they race through for a quick single
nudged to midwicket, Misbah charges out loooking for a single and Wahab sends him back just in time!
hmm, Harbhajan is lucky to get away with this one. It was really speared flat again, but well wide of off. Riaz slashes and doesn't connect, and that could've been called wide. Borderline
Riaz runs one down to short third man, and they steal a quick single
a very full delivery outside off bursts past the outside edge as Riaz tries to drive
what is it with the left-arm quicks today? Riaz takes his cue from the Zaheer/Nehra school of batting, backing away to be beaten flailing outside off
bouncer! Again Riaz was making room, Nehra followed him with the bouncer and he was forced to duck
another dot ball! Riaz clears the left leg, Nehra hurls down a low, dipping full toss wide of off and it slips past the bat

there's another one! Full and straight, Riaz swings mightily across the line but all he can do is send the ball straight up in the air, an easy catch for Tendulkar at cover. India are just two wickets away from a World Cup final. Pakistan are still alive, but only just. The pressure really told on Riaz there, all those dot balls made him feel as though he absolutely had to hit the boundary
low full toss, Misbah cracks it to mid-on and they charge through for one
ha! He's not listening to me. Zaheer sends down a leg-stump half-volley and Misbah clips him neatly to the square leg boundary
slower ball, on a length and outside off. Misbah taps it towards point and they scramble through for one
Gul guides down to third man to get off the mark
full and fast outside off, driven with very little timing at all ... but that gives them the chance to sprint through for another
Gul gets too far underneath a low full toss, chipping it in the air to midwicket ... but it falls safely in no-man's land
whipped powerfully off the pads, but straight to Raina at midwicket ... Misbah wanted one all the same, but Gul sent him back. Raina's throw is just wide, and would've caught him short!

gone! Full, swinging, and Gul is struck flush on the foot as he swipes across the line. He asks for a review but to no avail, that's stone dead. Gul's unhappy day comes to an end. India are just one wicket away from a dream final
full, hooping through the air around off stump and it's tapped sheepishly to point
back of a length, too quick for Ajmal and he's late on the pull. The ball goes nowhere
full again, the ball takes a thick edge as Ajmal tries to angle it down and rolls away through gully
Misbah opens his stance and pushes to mid-on, rushing across for a single
high full toss outside off, Ajmal runs it down to third man but Misbah says no to the single - he's got to keep the strike if Pakistan's slim hopes are to be kept alive
well, Zaheer's completely lost the radar here. Misbah backed away to leg and Zaheer tried to follow him but he went too far, the ball shooting well down the leg side and beating a diving Dhoni
full and straight, Misbah steps away and slams it straight to mid-off. He's got to hit the ball in the air, there aren't many gaps along the ground
that could've been it! Misbah steps away, Zaheer follows him with a length delivery and he still goes for the cut, chopping it down just past his stumps
full toss outside off, and Misbah puts it away through cover. Too late?
length delivery, slapped out to the man who's just been placed at deep cover. He turns the single down
slower ball from Zaheer, Misbah picks it and lifts it sweetly over mid-on, four more! Is there still a chance here?
tip-and-run from Misbah, he pushes to mid-off and they charge through ... he's home, just!
on a length and straight, Misbah steps to leg and, perhaps undone by the pace of the wicket, can only defend
six! Slammed down the ground, sailing over the boundary. Fifty for Misbah, but there are just too many runs needed now
Munaf hits a length again, and Misbah can only tap it back to the bowler
slapped out to deep cover, Misbah is just backing himself to hit boundaries now, again he turns down the single
Misbah clears the front leg and muscles this to wide long-on, but Raina sprints across to save the boundary ... that's just a single.
Ajmal walks across to off and paddles ... but he can't beat short fine leg! If that had been a boundary ...
drilled down the ground, Misbah turns down the single ... so now he's got to hit every ball for six
full and wide outside off, is that a wide? Swing and a miss from Misbah
short, pulled and straight to midwicket. The crowd are excited now, they know India are through
on a length now, heaved across the line and straight to midwicket
there's the game! Misbah swings, the ball goes miles up in the air and lands safely in Kohli's hands at long-on
